title: My Name Is Pink
description: A Sociopathic Assassin.The NYPD Chief Commissioner.   What could go wrong? Bianca Ashby was sixteen when she first saw Theodore Hastings, then a young man with a bright future in criminal justice. Her obsession was immediate, as was her desire to own him. But between her job as a freelance assassin and her cover as a shy socialite, there was no way to attract his attention. Enter Pink. The persona she invented just so she could get closer to him. Yet even that disguise has a shelf life. So what can an obsessed woman do to get a man, and keep him too?  My Name Is Pink is the prequel to Morally Corrupt. It ends on a cliffhanger. Please be advised that it contains mature themes and triggers that might upset some readers.
author: Veronica Lancet
